remarks:
An ordered pair is nonempty if the arguments are sets.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.) 

---

 An ordered pair is nonempty if the arguments are sets (it is also inhabited; see ~ opm ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
